PATIENT_ID: TEST_RIB_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 10:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 10:15:00
Category II trauma activation for 42-year-old female, MVC.
BP 125/75, HR 82, RR 16, GCS 15.
Chest wall non-tender. Primary complaint is left wrist pain.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-21 10:45:00
CT Chest: No fractures identified. Lungs clear. No pneumothorax.
Left wrist x-ray: Distal radius fracture, non-displaced.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 11:00:00
No thoracic injury identified. Wrist fracture management initiated.
Discharged with splint and orthopedic follow-up.
